group_1.textLeft: So, that Mitsune girl is actually an@emo character?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, seems so...

group_1.textLeft: I mean, is it really that bad to be a shut-in@in the first place?
If you become a Magical Girl, you're forced to@go out to survive.

group_1.textRight: That's why she had to accept the reality and@try to change herself.
Yeah, she's been trying to change on her own...

group_1.textLeft: Well, from this cutie's point of view, you're both@trying hard yourselves.

group_1.textRight: But, we're just doing what we're told, so...
Plus, when we're scared, we tend to run away...

group_1.textLeft: Kyahaha★
True, that's what you two are like.

group_1.textRight: Ugh...

group_1.textLeft: But see, I was right about that chick.

group_1.textRight: Ah...

group_1.textCenter: From this cutie's point of view, that one girl@was just playing a character.
She's trying hard, but it felt like she was just@forcing herself, y'know?

group_1.textRight: Wow, you really do understand these kinds of@things...
Himena?

group_1.textLeft: One sec, bae's calling...
Yeah, we don't have that much time before@our deadline...
Isn't that, like, against the rules...?
She wants us to clear it by ourselves...
Well, since you’re the one suggesting it, Hiko,@there might be a chance...

group_1.textRight: Princess...?

group_1.textLeft: He said we should team up with those girls.

group_1.textRight: What...?!
But you said you refused because you wanted@to be on the top...
And if we don't figure this out on our own,@the instructor won't approve...

group_1.textLeft: If those two aren't interested in being on@the top, let's talk them into working under us.
That's what we're good at, isn't it?

group_1.textRight: ...is that what your boyfriend told you?

group_1.textLeft: You get me, Shigurin.

group_1.textRight: But, why so suddenly...?

group_1.textLeft: At this rate, our ten days are gonna fly by.
The closer we get to the festival, the more@the instructor's gonna hassle us over it.
So, we may as well bring those two into the mix@and get it over with.

group_1.textRight: But, we searched high and low, and didn't find@any strong Witches...
Yeah...even if we add those two...we still@have to start our search from scratch...

group_1.textLeft: If we just keep racking our brains about it like a@bunch of goody-two-shoes, we won't go anywhere.
Even Hiko and I can't figure it out.

group_1.textRight: [chara:103001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Um, erm, then how can we solve it?

group_1.textLeft: All we gotta do is juuuust...fake it!

group_1.textRight: You mean, we're going to LIE to the instructor...?!

group_1.textLeft: That's how things have gotta be, don't you think?
If we convince them it's over, we've won, right?
Let's get the instructor and her tag-along to@join us and wrap this up quickly.
Kyahaha★

group_1.textRight: I can't believe you're such a villain,@Princess...

group_1.textLeft: You're gonna make me cry, y'know?
While this cutie works on recruiting those girls...
You two have got another job to do.

group_1.textRight: Wh-what is it...?

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*...

group_1.textRight: You're unbelievable, Himena... What are we@supposed to do...?

group_1.textLeft: Why don't you two go to the Satomi Medical@Center and pay her a visit?

group_1.textRight: Oh, do you mean Lady Touka...?

group_1.textLeft: Nah, I mean the ex-Magius Alina Gray.

group_1.textRight: WHAAAAT?!

group_1.textLeft: You ought to be a little quieter on the train.

group_1.textRight: B-b-but...!
There's no reason to visit her...!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, but there IS!
I want you to get me one of her pet Witches.

group_1.textRight: Oh, for fooling the instructor...!

group_1.textLeft: Bingo! You nailed it!
Now then, the student group is dismissed!

group_1.textRight: Yes, thank you for your hard work, chairman.

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah! San, Miyuri.

group_1.textRight: What is it?

group_1.textLeft: Regarding the dance rehearsal, I found the time@to talk to the Shinto priest and finalize it.

group_1.textRight: Truly?! Thank you!

group_1.textLeft: It'd be disrespectful to the gods if we@don't even practice it.

group_1.textRight: As long as you provide us a place to practice,@we'll give it our all!
I-I won't make any mistakes this year!

group_1.textLeft: Well, assuming you can remain conscious.

group_1.textRight: Even so, even sooo...!
Wow, a message at the same time as@Lady San!

group_1.textLeft: It's most likely from Her Highness.

group_1.textRight: Lady San...this is...
Excuse me, chairman. When does the@dance practice begin?

group_1.textLeft: The day after tomorrow, continuing on for@the next two days. Is that a bad time...?

group_1.textRight: No, it's fine.
Tomorrow is the only day I have some business@that I can't miss.
